The good news is that you won't have long to wait to get said guidance, as you'll find a strange man with a giant gourd on his back just up the stairs from the Snake Trail Shrine in the Bamboo Grove. Speak to him, and he'll upgrade your Gourd to allow Spirit Absorption, which you can use go gain Will from green Wisps, and harness the Spirit Attacks of certain enemies and bosses that drop purple or blue Spirits when they die.
img_below_text:
If you tried to absorb one before gaining the upgrade, simply head to your Shrine and select the Spirit Cultivation option, and you can retrieve any Spirits you left out in the world.
## How to Increase Gourd Uses and Healing Amount

1. **Image Summary:**  
The image depicts an in-game interface for retrieving lost Spirits in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It shows a "Wandering Wight" Spirit available for retrieval, alongside a decorative shrine-like structure with a hanging gourd and cherry blossoms in the background. The interface includes a prompt to "Hold to Retrieve" the Spirit.

2. **Purpose and Narrative Role:**  
The image illustrates the gameplay mechanic tied to Spirit Cultivation, where players can recover Spirits left behind in the world after gaining the gourd upgrade. This mechanic is part of the progression system, enabling players to harness Spirit Attacks and enhance their abilities. The shrine serves as the location for managing Spirit-related upgrades and retrievals.
